generated_text:
- road: The image shows a cobblestone street with cars parked along the sides, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: There is a paved area alongside the road, separated by metal bollards, which is designated for pedestrians or cyclists, indicating a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple multi-story structures with windows and commercial signage are visible along both sides of the street, indicating buildings.
- vegetation: Several trees with green leaves are visible along the street, indicating vegetation.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the left side of the street, including a silver Volkswagen and a black SUV.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the right sidewalk, leaning against a bollard.
- traffic sign: A circular "No Stopping" traffic sign is visible on the right side of the street.
- pole: Several vertical poles, including one holding the traffic sign, are visible along the sidewalk.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk in the distance, near the center of the image.
